channel.title: ATT Wireless on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in ATT Wireless on 0x000216

item.title: LG Xenon Exotic Messaging Phone
item.description: The LG Xenon gets its name from the element Xenon, which gives off a blue glow when electrically charged, just like the blue version of this phone. But the red one is named for being “red hot” - a nod to its impressive messaging features. Messaging is the heart of the LG Xenon. It’s perfect for those who love to text, featuring a full-length slide-out QWERTY keyboard for effortless typing. And when you’re not messaging, the Xenon easily transitions back to a sleek and pocket-friendly candybar-style phone.

item.title: Doing BACKFLIPs with MOTOBLUR
item.description: Would you do a backflip for your current cell phone? Probably not, but Motorola’s BACKFLIP might just change your mind. This phone’s unique feature is its reverse hinge. Unlike most phones where the keyboard is hidden beneath the screen, the BACKFLIP’s keyboard is located on the exterior, flipping open to reveal a full-size touchscreen. This design eliminates the need for a smaller internal screen, offering a more spacious keyboard and a high-resolution touchscreen experience comparable to a small computer.

item.title: From Here to Samsung Eternity
item.description: It’s a frigid winter day with howling winds and accumulating snow outside. However, right here before me, I’m captivated by a Hawaiian beach scene playing on a screen. A young couple enjoys the crashing waves. It’s so realistic that I’m tempted to step into the picture and join them on the warm sand. Despite knowing it’s just a TV screen, I feel a noticeable warmth. This captivating scene effectively blocks out the dreary winter weather outside my window, showcasing the impressive power of visual suggestion.
